name: Drunken Underwater Research
description:
This game was made for Weekly Hour Game Jam 12 in 5 hours. You are controling a submarine. You win when you collect all of the ores, but there are sharks which will stop you so you have to shoot them with your harpoons.


Controls

  • Rotate: A and D
  • Accelerate: W and S
  • Shoot: F
  • Restart (When dead): R

Tools: CodeLite (IDE), GIMP (Drawing), Tiled (Level Editor)

I programmed this game with my own engine which I developed using SDL. It is written in C++. I created all assets on my own.

Tested Platforms: Ubuntu 64-Bit, Windows 10 64-Bit
